"Volcanic Bombs":
"In the Stia Region, during certain weather conditions, you will encounter Volcanic Bombs falling from the sky.

You can access Volcanic Bombs to pick them up as a throwable item.

If you leave them long enough without accessing them, they will explode and disappear."

"When thrown, Volcanic Bombs will explode on impact, damaging nearby enemies and destroying certain objects.

Volcanic Bombs' explosive power increases over time, but if you hold them for too long, they explode by themselves, dealing damage to the holder."
